BarXiv

Go to the GitHub repository for download.

BarXiv is a very simple LaTeX2e package for the beamer class. It enables audience-friendly citations of papers which may or may not be on the arXiv. These are highlighted according to the age of the reference, according to the ubiquitous colormaps of Matplotlib. BarXiv does not need Python. Here is a simple beamer frame to illustrate barxiv in use for some cmap choices.
